name: useAutoSave
description: A robust hook for auto-saving form data with debouncing, race-condition handling, and lifecycle safety.  It monitors the `data` state and triggers the `onSave` callback after a specified `delay` of inactivity. It also provides a smart `onChange` handler that adapts to both React Events and direct values.

props.name: initialData
props.description: The initial state of the data object.

props.name: onSave
props.description: The async function to call when data changes. Receives the clean data payload.

returns.name: data
returns.description: The current state of the data.

returns.name: isSaving
returns.description: Indicates if a save operation is currently in progress.

returns.name: onChange
returns.description: A smart change handler factory. Can be used with standard inputs `onChange("name")` or direct values `onChange("age")(30)`.

returns.name: setData
returns.description: Standard React state setter for the data.
